scripts.install:subpackages: cd common && pnpm install && cd ../backend && pnpm install && cd ../frontend && pnpm install
scripts.dev: pnpm --filter @chronosync/web run dev:frontend && pnpm --filter @chronosync/web run dev:backend
scripts.build: pnpm run build:frontend && pnpm run build:backend
scripts.test: pnpm run test:frontend && pnpm run test:backend
